column1: Smoque BBQ////I will admit I am not a huge BBQ snob
column2: but this is pretty darn good food. The brisket
column5: and chicken are all super yummy
column6: and the baked beans and mac and cheese are great sides. The cole slaw is vinegar-based
column8: and I know that's not everyone's cup of tea
column9: but I like it. The peach cobbler is a nice finale.
